home.title: Welcome to Tele-Pharmacy
home.subtitle: Your digital pharmacy solution
home.whyChooseUsDesc: We provide the best pharmacy services with quality products and expert advice
home.fastDeliveryDesc: Get your medications delivered to your doorstep within 24 hours
home.licensedPharmacistsDesc: Our certified professionals ensure safe and accurate medication dispensing
home.247SupportDesc: Round-the-clock assistance for all your pharmaceutical needs
home.qualityAssuranceDesc: All medications are verified and stored under proper conditions
home.featuredMedicationsDesc: Top-rated medications available at competitive prices
home.nearbyPharmaciesDesc: Find pharmacies closest to your location
home.connectWithPharmacists: Connect with our licensed pharmacists for tele-consultation
home.testimonialsDesc: Hear what our customers have to say about our services
home.testimonialText: This service has made getting my medications so much easier and more convenient. Highly recommended!
home.noPharmaciesFound: No pharmacies found in your area
home.tryDifferentLocation: Try searching in a different location or browse all pharmacies

cart.title: Your Cart
cart.startAdding: Start adding some medications to your cart.
cart.shippingInfo: Shipping and taxes calculated at checkout.

search.title: Search Medications
search.enterToSearch: Enter a medication name to search

profile.title: Profile
profile.reauthDescription: To update your email address, please verify your identity by entering your current password.

pharmacyDashboard.title: Pharmacy Dashboard
pharmacyDashboard.noPermission: You don't have permission to access this page.

inventoryManager.title: Inventory Manager
inventoryManager.addMedicationToStart: Get started by adding a new medication.
inventoryManager.frontendSimulation: This is a frontend-only simulation. In a real application:
inventoryManager.note1: Inventory data would be fetched from a backend API
inventoryManager.note2: Changes would be persisted to a database
inventoryManager.note3: Real-time updates would be implemented with WebSockets
inventoryManager.note4: Barcode scanning would be integrated for quick inventory management

auth.name: Full Name
auth.emailNotVerified: Please verify your email before logging in. Check your inbox for the verification email.
auth.registrationSuccess: Registration successful! Please check your email for verification.
auth.emailInUse: An account with this email already exists. Please try logging in instead.
auth.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
auth.weakPassword: Password should be at least 6 characters. Please choose a stronger password.
auth.userNotFound: No account found with this email. Please check your email or sign up for a new account.
auth.wrongPassword: Incorrect password. Please try again or reset your password.
auth.userDisabled: This account has been disabled. Please contact support for assistance.
auth.tooManyRequests: Too many failed login attempts. Please try again later or reset your password.
auth.networkError: Network error. Please check your internet connection and try again.
auth.enterEmailForReset: Please enter your email address to reset your password.
auth.resetFailed: Failed to send password reset email
auth.resetEmailSent: Password reset email sent! Please check your inbox.
auth.termsAgreement: By signing up, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
auth.emailVerificationNote: Email verification is required for security. Please check your inbox after registration.

teleConsult.title: Tele-Consultation
teleConsult.pharmacistDescription: Speak with a licensed pharmacist about your prescriptions, medications, and health concerns. Our pharmacists are available 24/7 to provide professional advice.
teleConsult.licensedProfessionalsDescription: All our pharmacists are licensed and verified professionals.
teleConsult.securePrivateDescription: All consultations are encrypted and HIPAA compliant.
teleConsult.availability247Description: Connect with a pharmacist anytime, anywhere.
